thread.title: Adventures Around the World with Disney Cruise Line This Summer
thread.title_full: Adventures Around the World with Disney Cruise Line This Summer

author: Arnaldo Zanonato
title: Adventures Around the World with Disney Cruise Line This Summer
text:
Who’s already thinking about summer vacation? As usual, we have some pretty incredible options for families cruising with us. In addition to new Caribbean voyages , we’re taking you to new destinations in both Alaska and Europe . 

I have lots of details to share about the Port Adventures in these spectacular locales, so stay tuned over the next several weeks as I highlight all there is to see and do this summer with Disney Cruise Line . First up, I’ll take you to Icy Strait Point , a premier wilderness destination in America’s Last Frontier and home to one of the longest and highest zip riders in the world. Remember, when the ship’s in port, venture ashore!
